unittitle_ssm: Board of Trustees of the Brooklyn Fire Department meeting minutes
abstract_ssm: The Board of Trustees of the Brooklyn Fire Department meeting minutes list the members and officers of the board for each year and record votes taken and motions passed at each meeting between 1848 and 1854.
